pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Stewardship management establishes a better connection with your donor organisation
  • Utilise Stewardship Activities tab to steward a donor effectively. Strategically adding steps to engage and inspire a donor to give again.
  • Utilise notes section to capture additional information.

• Completed’ indicates that stewardship plan has hit its close date.
  • Utilise 'Completion Summary' to explain the reason a stewardship plan as completed.

• 'Inactive’ indicates that stewardship plan has been abandoned for future engagements.
  • Utilise 'Inactive Summary' to explain the reason the stewardship has become inactive.
